title: Bang Bang Long Chudong season2
title_japanese: 帮帮龙出动 第二季
synopsis: There is a species in the universe, they are born with the mission of helping others, to protect everyone in the vast universe, they are the universe hero-help the dragon. Among them, four gang dragons have been assigned to the earth to protect everyone’s safety. They are: the strong and brave Wes, the smart and knowledgeable Tom, the caring Vicky, and the naughty Le Ping. They are here. In a harmonious town, live with the residents of the town. Whenever the residents encounter difficulties or accidents in life, Bangbanglong will all mobilize and work together to help everyone. Every thing they experience They will understand some truths, and in this way, help the dragons and the residents learn together, grow together, and forge a deep friendship. So, what story will happen today? (translated from blibili)
